8_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj.body: Hi, am new to ZeroNet. I am getting a tor Errno 111. I am using Linux Manjaro and downloaded the tor browser bundle. Could someone please help.

Hi @tusiko, thanks.
I tried what you indicated, but I am still having the same issue. I started tor service, and restarted the zeronet server.
I opened the TBB and accessed the zeronet home from there. I am still getting the same 111 error(connection refused). All the ports are opened on my router.

@tusiko, before I asked here, I followed this guide: https://zeronet.io/docs/faq/ . I can access zeronet using the browser bundle, but the connections do not go through the tor network. At the top, of the zeronet homepage, I see "port:opened" ,"tor:error" and "seeders: 10/14". it is the tor:error part that is bugging me. Online, people don't seem to be having this problem.
Thanks @tusiko, I have been able to connect to to tor on ZeroNet using this guide: https://wiki.archlinux.org/index.php/ZeroNet. It now reads "Tor:Always".
